I know Primanti's is a major Pittsburgh favorite but I personally am not a fan of coleslaw so I don't really like them! I know some people will think I'm crazy! Fans love the fries and coleslaw on the sandwich. I opted for the Caribbean Chopped Salad which was fine but not something l'll be dying to come back for. Pretzel app basket comes with nacho cheese and 2 different types of mustard. The pretzels were nice because they weren't fried and actually not bad. 

Our server was quick and polite. Prices pretty cheap. Three of us are for $40 including 4 beers (during happy hour). Cleanliness was average with nothing terrible but we did walk through spilled fries to our seat on the way in. 

The atmosphere is nothing special and just reminds me of any chain restaurant. There is nice patio seating though, TVs with sports on and lots of beer options. 

If you love the sandwiches or think you might, then definitely check it out, otherwise, I think there is better places to eat.

fo9maH0LHJ5lNtpcfDcpXQ.author: Blaise P.
fo9maH0LHJ5lNtpcfDcpXQ.description: Tonight's visit was completely terrible. Me and my gf came here for a date night and it was a big let down. On entering we stood at the door way for almost five minutes as a lady kept walking past with no greeting. Finely a guy comes over who was maybe a manager or someone other than a normal server seats us in the back corner right next to the kitchen doors. So next we wait another ten or fifteen minutes and again finely someone decided to approach us and greet us after walking past a couple times. And he's not even our server he says he's running other tables and gets us drinks and forgets straws and lemons but takes our order and walks away so then we wait for that. Waiting still to meet our actual server as we wait almost twenty minutes for our food. As we are sitting here I can see directly into the kitchen and a cook behind the line with his green hat backwards and headphones in and a navy blueish shirt on is clearly eating food with no gloves on while cooking. Like how is that ok? That's a huge issue with food safety and health regulations but clearly no one seems to care as he continues. Our server ended up being a lady named Casey. She came by twice once to give us food and once to give the check. I'm so disappointed in the service we received during this trip and it's disappointing and a huge turn off with the staff eating behind the line while cooking. I really hope another guest has to sit in that spot and watch like I did.

fo9maH0LHJ5lNtpcfDcpXQ.author: Sara B.
fo9maH0LHJ5lNtpcfDcpXQ.description: Always fresh and delicious! Love the food especially the turkey sandwich and the loaded tots!

fo9maH0LHJ5lNtpcfDcpXQ.author: Meghan G.
fo9maH0LHJ5lNtpcfDcpXQ.description: Delicious! The Pitts-Burger was huge and perfectly cooked, and the lamb gyro was equally good, though not quite as big. A great place to stop on across country road trip!

fo9maH0LHJ5lNtpcfDcpXQ.author: Lee B.
fo9maH0LHJ5lNtpcfDcpXQ.description:
I don't  care what anyone else says!!!
About Primanti Bros. Double  beef and cheese that's all you need to know!!!
Love the sirloin beef too also had pork schnitzel which I think is the best sandwich. The pizza is always tasty as-well it is better than some pizza shops that I've been to. I love the sever the staff here are super and friendly. Great job

fo9maH0LHJ5lNtpcfDcpXQ.author: Frank S.
fo9maH0LHJ5lNtpcfDcpXQ.description: Food is always a toss up when my family goes here. Either great or awful. Service is usually, woefully subpar. Only really go here when I have a taste for nostalgia, and this is the closest location to me. Nowhere close to the original location, in quality and standards. Franchise location definitely missing the old school primanti's flare

fo9maH0LHJ5lNtpcfDcpXQ.author: Larry J.
fo9maH0LHJ5lNtpcfDcpXQ.description: Got dinner here with the wife, had to try the new polka line sandwich, which was very good ! However I think I'd go back to the classic steak or corn beef. Really busy but we got right in and the service was great. Food and Drinks we're good too ... Always like this location

fo9maH0LHJ5lNtpcfDcpXQ.author: Ak M.
fo9maH0LHJ5lNtpcfDcpXQ.description:
I would like to think it was an "off day" here.  Chips and queso with stale chips...meh.  Pittsburgher sandwich...same, meh.  Meat overcooked...yet not warm...so me thinks they cooked several up ahead of time....cheese was not melted....sorta of no taste today with my sandwich at Lebo location...very disappointed. Arrived about 2:45, so not busy...maybe that was the problem...using up left overs from lunch...but seriously someone taste the chips before you put them on a plate/serve...
I realize it is humid...but get containers and keep things fresh.

fo9maH0LHJ5lNtpcfDcpXQ.author: Mike K.
fo9maH0LHJ5lNtpcfDcpXQ.description: Sat at the bar for lunch. Bartender was great. Onion rings fantastic, steak sandwich perfect. My wife liked it too. Too much ( vodka and Red Bull). Can't wait to get back to Pittsburgh.

fo9maH0LHJ5lNtpcfDcpXQ.author: Lexi Z.
fo9maH0LHJ5lNtpcfDcpXQ.description:
We came on a week night. It was busy, but we were seated right away. This place is great to catch up with friends and have some good food and drinks. This is always a go to. The sandwiches are delicious. They also offer a large variety of different craft beers! Always appreciate ipa and a big selection! We got the bacon & cheese sandwich and the salami and cheese sandwich. We both ordered sides of fries with cheese. Everything was great, service was quick, and food was amazing. We never get tomatoes on ours, but the slaw and fries combo is perfect with basically any of their sandwiches! 

Ps.. the Primanti size fry is huge! Trust your waiter when they say it feeds multiple people!

fo9maH0LHJ5lNtpcfDcpXQ.author: Brandon C.
fo9maH0LHJ5lNtpcfDcpXQ.description: I was hoping for a great experience like the last time I was here...unfortunately that was not the case!  We waited over an hour for our food, which was cold when it came out.  It didn't seem to be overly busy, yet the server was awful!  We couldn't get drink refills, and she seemed bothered by any request we had.  After 2 hours we finally had to ask for the check.  Definitely not the experience I was hoping for on my trip.

fo9maH0LHJ5lNtpcfDcpXQ.author: DJ J.
fo9maH0LHJ5lNtpcfDcpXQ.description:
Ok, another update.  We occasionally come to this location and the service is always excellent.  We actually come on Mother's Day (not our traditional Mom's Day place but fun) in the evening and had a short wait for a table but it was less time then quoted, which was a plus.  Our waitress was so good and on top of everything.  She even stepped away as our kids gave their Mom a card and present.  
The food was good and is the standard Primanti's which we enjoy but I do realize not everyone wants fries on there sandwich.  We started with some wings that were good and piping hot.  I had PB Rueben, that was really enjoyable and not to many calories, lol.  All in all, a fun place to celebrate.
